#summary Crystal provides several Java 5 annotation classes.
#labels Phase-Implementation,Annotations

= Introduction =

Crystal provides several Java 5 annotation classes that you may find useful for writing analyses with Crystal.

= Meta-annotations =

== @!MultiAnnotation ==

Place this annotation on an annotation class that aggregates other annotations to get around Java's "one-annotation-of-each-type-per-element" restriction.  When seeing an annotation class that is annotated with @!MultiAnnotation, Crystal's annotation database automatically unwraps the surrounded annotations.
